text: Jara tumhi krtaghnata karala tara (laksata theva ki) allaha tumha sarvampasuna nihsprha ahe ani to apalya dasancya krtaghnatene khusa nahi ani jara tumhi krtajnata vyakta karala tara to tyasa tumacyasathi pasanta karila ani konihi konace ojhe ucalanara nahi, maga tumha sarvance paratane tumacya palanakartyakadeca ahe, to tumhala dakhavuna de'ila, je kahi tumhi karata hote. Nihsansaya, to manatalya gosti dekhila janato
